Studio apartment bedroom integrated into the living space with a designated quiet zone, featuring modular furnishing and concealed storage. Vastu alignment ensures calm energy.
Dedicated library area with built-in bookshelves, reading nooks, and ample natural light from strategically placed openings. Vastu principles ensure the space is harmonious.
